i5.las2peer.execution

Class L2pThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • i5.las2peer.execution.L2pThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, java.lang.Runnable

    public class L2pThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Context
    a L2pThread is responsible for running a single RMITask inside a Node

      • invoke

        public java.io.Serializable invoke(java.lang.String service,
                                   java.lang.String method,
                                   java.io.Serializable... parameters)
                            throws ServiceNotFoundException,
                                   ServiceNotAvailableException,
                                   RemoteServiceException
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Invokes the method of any other service on behalf of the main agent, thus sending the main agent as calling agent.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface Context
        Parameters:
        service - The service class. A version may be specified (for example package.serviceClass@1.0.0-1 or package.serviceClass@1.0). The core tries to find an appropriate version (version 1.0.5 matches 1.0). If no version is specified, the newest version is picked.
        method - The service method.
        parameters - The parameters list.
        Returns:
        The invocation result.
        Throws:
        ServiceNotFoundException - If the service is not known to the network.
        ServiceNotAvailableException - If the service is temporarily not available.
        RemoteServiceException - If the remote service throws an exception.

      • invokeInterally

        public java.io.Serializable invokeInterally(java.lang.String service,
                                            java.lang.String method,
                                            java.io.Serializable... parameters)
                                     throws ServiceNotFoundException,
                                            ServiceNotAvailableException,
                                            RemoteServiceException
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Invokes a service method using the agent of this service as calling agent.
        Specified by:
        invokeInterally in interface Context
        Parameters:
        service - The service class. A version may be specified (for example package.serviceClass@1.0.0-1 or package.serviceClass@1.0). The core tries to find an appropriate version (version 1.0.5 matches 1.0). If no version is specified, the newest version is picked.
        method - The service method.
        parameters - The parameters list.
        Returns:
        The invocation result.
        Throws:
        ServiceNotFoundException - If the service is not known to the network.
        ServiceNotAvailableException - If the service is temporarily not available.
        RemoteServiceException - If the remote service throws an exception.
